question: 桑原
sourceReadingMnemonic:
These are both the kun'yomi readings, but you haven't learned this for <ja>原</ja> yet. It's actually the rendaku'd version, so let's just use mnemonic to remember it instead:

You know you're in a <vocabulary>mulberry field</vocabulary> when you see a bunch of capy<reading>bara</reading>s (<ja>ばら</ja>) rolling around in there with you. Capybaras love mulberries! Picture a whole family of capybaras munching on mulberries. Mm Mmm!
